data.trans_hint: Nhanh lên! Chúng ta sẽ bị trễ.
data.en_hint: Hurry up! We're going to be late.
data.content_game_1: Hurry up! We're going to be late.
data.answer_en_hint: Hurry up! We're going to be late.

data.trans: Dồn đống lại, dồn dập hơn
data.trans_hint: Công việc của anh ấy luôn dồn đống lại vào cuối năm.
data.en_hint: His work always piles up at the end of the year.
data.content_game_1: His work always piles up at the end of the year.
data.answer_en_hint: His work always piles up at the end of the year.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả mọi người đứng lên khi cô giáo bước vào lớp.
data.en_hint: Everybody stood up when the teacher entered the classroom.
data.content_game_1: Everybody stood up when the teacher entered the classroom.
data.answer_en_hint: Everybody stood up when the teacher entered the classroom.

data.trans_hint: Khi cô ấy tức giận, cô ta sẽ thái tất cả hành có trong nhà.
data.en_hint: When she is angry, she chops up all of the onions in the house.
data.content_game_1: When she is angry, she chops up all of the onions in the house.
data.answer_en_hint: When she is angry, she chops up all of the onions in the house.

data.trans_hint: Uống hết sữa rồi chuẩn bị đi học đi con.
data.en_hint: Drink up your milk, then get ready to go to school
data.content_game_1: Drink up your milk, then get ready to go to school
data.answer_en_hint: Drink up your milk, then get ready to go to school

data.trans_hint: Cho tôi năm phút để tôi ăn xong bữa trưa đã. Sau đó, tôi sẽ hỗ trợ bạn.
data.en_hint: Give me five minutes to finish up my lunch, and then I will assist you.
data.content_game_1: Give me five minutes to finish up my lunch, and then I will assist you.
data.answer_en_hint: Give me five minutes to finish up my lunch, and then I will assist you.

data.trans_hint: Cùng chất đồ lên xe và sau đó chúng ta có thể đi.
data.en_hint: Let's load up the car and then we can go.
data.content_game_1: Let's load up the car and then we can go.
data.answer_en_hint: Let's load up the car and then we can go.

data.trans_hint: Bởi vì lạm phát, chúng ta có lẽ phải tăng giá lên.
data.en_hint: Due to the inflation, we might need to put up the prices.
data.content_game_1: Due to the inflation, we might need to put up the prices.
data.answer_en_hint: Due to the inflation, we might need to put up the prices.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi làm xong bài tập về nhà của con, hãy dọn dẹp cái bàn học lại đi nhé.
data.en_hint: After you finish your homework, remember to tidy up your desk.
data.content_game_1: After you finish your homework, remember to tidy up your desk.
data.answer_en_hint: After you finish your homework, remember to tidy up your desk.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi phải thì thầm vì sợ rằng chúng tôi có thể đánh thức cô ấy dậy.
data.en_hint: We had to whisper for fear that we might wake her up.
data.content_game_1: We had to whisper for fear that we might wake her up.
data.answer_en_hint: We had to whisper for fear that we might wake her up.

data.trans: Kết thúc (bài phát biểu, cuộc họp)
data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ cố gắng kết thúc cuộc họp để chúng tôi có thể thảo luận về vấn đề này.
data.en_hint: I will try to wind up the meeting so that we can discuss this issue.
data.content_game_1: I will try to wind up the meeting so that we can discuss this issue.
data.answer_en_hint: I will try to wind up the meeting so that we can discuss this issue.
